title: Therapy Recommendation Schema
description: Schema for therapy recommendations based on patient profile

Therapy Category.description: The category of therapy recommended (e.g., Yoga and Pranayam, Kirtan and Mantras, etc.)

Therapy Subcategory.description: The specific subtype of the therapy category (e.g., Relaxation Techniques, Mindfulness Practices, etc.)

Therapy Rationale.description: A brief explanation of why this therapy is recommended based on the patient's profile
